tasks.title: Debug intermittent slice timeout incident
tasks.description: incident-debugging benchmark scenario: Debug intermittent slice timeout incident.

workflow.goal: Localize the highest-impact code paths quickly.
workflow.prompt: Triage task: Debug intermittent slice timeout incident. Identify the primary modules and likely risk hotspots.

workflow.goal: Trace control/data flow across the relevant components.
workflow.prompt: Investigate task: Debug intermittent slice timeout incident. Follow request-to-effect flow and find likely failure/regression points.

workflow.goal: Define verification criteria and regression checks.
workflow.prompt: Validate task: Debug intermittent slice timeout incident. List tests and checks that prove the issue is solved without regressions.
